smitespam: The name of the extension's entry in Special:SpecialPages.
smitespam-spam-pages-list-heading: Heading for the list of possible spam pages.
smitespam-delete-page-success-msg: Message to indicate successful deletion of page.
smitespam-delete-page-failure-msg: Message to indicate failure to delete page
smitespam-deleted-reason: Reason to give for deletion of a page
action-smitespam: Action for work done by Extesions:SmiteSpam
